item.title: Newsletter Signup Page
item.description: Newsletter signup web app developed in JS, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. The front-end sends POST request to the backend hosted on Heroku server. The backend is written in Node.js, which receives the request and submits it to Mailchimp API endpoint.

item.title: Flappy bird
item.description: Flappy bird clone game built using Unity

item.title: ISS Overhead Notifier
item.description: Use Open Notify API and Sunrise Sunset API to make the International Space Station overhead notifier. User receives an email when the ISS is close to the user’s current location

item.title: Dodge Game
item.description: Dodge all the bullets! Made with Unity.

item.title: Rain Alerts SMS
item.description: Use weather API and Twilio to check hourly weather condition in user’s location. If rain is expected, user receives a text message to bring an ☂️

item.title: Secrets Web App
item.description: Users can register or log in to their accounts to view or share any text-based secret messages with other users. Their secrets disappear after 24 hours.

item.title: TinDog
item.description: Responsive website developed using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap

item.title: Turtle Graphics Project
item.description: Use Python turtle module to draw different shapes, spirograph, random walking, and dot painting

item.title: To-do List Web App
item.description: To-do list web app developed using JS, EJS, and CSS. Node.js app on Heroku server makes requests to database hosted on mongoDB Atlas cloud service.

item.title: Blog Web App
item.description: Blog web app developed using JS, EJS, and CSS. Node.js app on Heroku server makes requests to database hosted on mongoDB Atlas cloud service.
